document.full_text: police commissioner charles ramsey, wooed to return to his hometown by chicago mayor-elect rahm emanuel, is staying put in philadelphia, the city's mayor said on thursday.
document.title: police boss ramsey rebuffs chicago, stays in philadelphia
lines_and_colors: police commissioner charles ramsey, wooed to return to his hometown by chicago mayor-elect rahm emanuel, is staying put in philadelphia, the city's mayor said on thursday.
